creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: torque with three silver rings; large rectangular silver piece lies at the middle of all three rings; the piece has a face of a water buffalo at top and two smaller water buffaloes in either corner; the third and largest ring has curlicues running all the way around it; the ends of each ring are a flat platform with a lizard design on them; connecting piece has wire wrapped around it and a large cone at the clasp
title: Torque
